actions.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Mathias. With written report No. 98-639.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1254.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing the printing of a revised edition of Senate document numbered 96-23, Ninty-Sixth Congress, first session, entitled "Majority and Minority Whips of the Senate" as a Senate document.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of a revised edition of the Senate document (96th Congress) entitled "Majority and Minority Whips of the Senate," including additional copies for the use of the Senate.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing the printing of a revised edition of Senate document numbered 96-23, Ninty-Sixth Congress, first session, entitled "Majority and Minority Whips of the Senate" as a Senate document.
